tosdr.case: You can request access and deletion of personal data

title: You can request access and deletion of personal data
quoteText:
Requests to know and requests to delete

You may request disclosure and/or deletion of any information we have collected about you by either:

  1. filling out the form available here, or
  2. emailing us with the details of your request at support@urbandictionary.com

We will be in touch after receiving your request to verify your identity and to process your request.
